resources.array:
//Dares - Adult (testArray5)
Tell something very intimate
Do your best fake “O” while looking the person to the left of you in the eye
You have to leave an R-rated voicemail for an ex
Someone has to lick peanut butter, chocolate sauce, or whipped cream off your finger, cheek, or somewhere of their choice
Someone feeds you M and Ms or other small chocolate candy and you have to say, “Thank you, Daddy," after each one
If there’s a pool, you have to go skinny dipping, and you have to choose one buddy to go with you
You’re in school and you’ve been a bad student. For the next round, you’re in time out on someone’s lap
Get within one inch of the other person, look them straight in the eye, and tell them how you feel about them for one minute. Do not touch them
Take a body shot off the person of the groups choosing
You have to do whatever your partner or group tells you for one minute
Let the group look at whatever they want for a minute with your phone
Imitate the sounds of both sides of your most recent romantic encounter
Try to hit on someone in this group like you’re at a bar
Pretend like you’re making sweet, sweet, love to the couch for a minutes
Pick up a random book and read it in the most seductive voice you can manage
Slap your butt and say “I’ve been bad, bad, bad, bad, bad, bad, bad, bad, bad, naughty!”
Everyone calls you “Weiner” for the rest of the night
Put on the national anthem and do your sexiest dance to it
Go grab a broom and do your best tango
Give someone a foot massage
Twerk for 30 seconds
Curse like sailor for 20 seconds straight
Play a song on by slapping your butt cheeks till someone guesses the song
Let someone shave part of your body
Kiss the person to your left
Get slapped on the face by the person of your choosing
Seduce a member of the same gender in the group
Poll dance for 1 minute with an imaginary pole
Choose someone from the group to give you a spanking
Remove your pants for rest of the game
Read out a sext loudly in a seductive voice
Tell us one part of your body which you feel proud of and give it a name
Imitate the sounds from your last romantic encounter
Make the sexiest sounds possible while you’re chewing food
Tell us about your craziest date
Kiss someone of the same gender
Describe the most romantic thing you’ve done
Give someone a lap dance
Model for a sexy photo
Whisper something naughty into someones ear
Go to an online sex store and try to sell the weirdest product you find to the rest of the group
Show everyone your favourite pornstar
Act like someones slave for 2 rounds
Propose to someone in the group
Take a picture of your tummy and send it to your crush
Ask your best friend to turn around and spank them without explaining.
Do yoga poses while moaning seductively
Mimic how your most recent sexual encounter acted in bed
Try a role playing sexual act with someone
Pinch every guy’s and girl’s butt in this room
Turn on someone with your facial expressions
Tell everybody an embarrassing story about yourself
Use a voice-changing filter on Snapchat and send someone a snap saying "I wanna hug you till you die"
Pull up your favourite porn site your phone right now
Make dirty faces to your partner
Explain your worst experience with anyone
French kiss your partner passionately
